name: Make it count (swegg4n)
description:
Make it count

Move the player, aim your gun and rotate platforms to kill all enemies with your last bullet. 

Controls

E - switch between fire and edit mode

WASD/arrow keys - move

LMB - fire

RMB + mouse - aim

Created

This game was created for  'GMTK Game Jam 2019' (Aug 2 - 4, 2019). The theme of the jam was "only one".
